steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the 'Review' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Proofing' group, click on the 'Spelling & Grammar' button.
Review the spelling and grammar suggestions for the document.
Make necessary corrections to the spelling and grammar errors.
Click on the 'Review' tab again to continue with other proofing options.
Repeat steps 3-6 for other proofing options like 'Thesaurus', 'Translate', etc.
Once all proofing options are reviewed and corrected, save the document.
